conbody.p: Euca2ools 3.2.3 has the following new features.

ul.li: euca-authorize and euca-revoke now support 68-bit security group IDs.
euform-create-stack now returns an error when given tags with empty names.
euform-create-stack no longer sends a DisableRollback option unless it is explicitly requested.

entry.p: Configuration for the retired Eucalyptus Community Cloud has been removed.
